channel.title: AI-ML on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in AI-ML on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 18, 2023
item.description:
This week a lot of AI/ML in the roundup. Specifically Generative AI and AI self-play. Really “cool” stuff.

Of course, I have some Kafka coverage as well. This in the form of a post about Confluent Platform 7.4 and all the new “goodies” in that release.

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 49, 2022
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth that has to do with things that interest me:

  • AI/data science
  • data in general
  • data architecture
  • streaming
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me for the week just ending.
